detail_desc: 3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider cuffed sleeves and a flared skirt. Lined at the front of the bodice.
Warm-lined hat in woven fabric with ears at the top, earflaps and a strap with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Soft faux fur lining.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft, block-coloured sweatshirt fabric. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Coat in woven fabric containing some wool with notch lapels and an additional detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Lined.
Fitted cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Shirt in cotton twill with a concealed button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short, wrapover dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, concealed press-stud at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce and sewn-on bow. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a gently flared skirt and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and decorative buttons down the front.

Long dress with a lace bodice and skirt in an airy weave. Scalloped V-neck with support panels at the top, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with scalloped trims, a seam at the waist with a grosgrain band, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap, flap with a fastener, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 8x17.5x22 cm.
Sleep mask in faux fur with appliqués and an elastic strap at the back. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for optimum fit.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some mohair with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Double-layered hairband made from braided fake hair with fabric butterfly appliqués at the front and elastic at the back.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Shoulder bag in woven fabric with a zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. One outer compartment with a concealed zip and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Depth 7.5 cm. Height 15.5 cm. Width 23 cm.

Top in soft, spot-print viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Tunic in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small frilled collar an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves, wide cuffs with a flounce and covered buttons, and a flounce at the hem. Inner tunic in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with press-studs and cuffed hems.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Small, smocked, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with scalloped edges and short, raglan sleeves with scalloped edges. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print and narrow, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, one with a small decoration.

Boiler suit in washed cotton denim with a detachable tie belt. Collar, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back and covered elastication at the back of the waist. Flap chest pockets, front pockets, back pockets and straight legs. The cotton content of the boiler suit is partly recycled.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered elastication and overlocked edges around the neckline and armholes. Seam at the waist with covered elastication, and short legs with elasticated hems.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a peplum.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets, elastication at the cuffs and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Contrasting colour trims down the sleeves, and ribbed cuffs. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose jersey with a gentle, lace-trimmed V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Jacket in imitation suede with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with adjustable tabs and metal buckles. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Waist belt in imitation suede with elastication at the back and an adjustable metal buckle fastening. Width 5 cm.

Straight, relaxed-fit shirt in a textured cotton weave with a text print and embroidery. Turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an inner pocket at the hem and short slits in the sides.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with stand-up collar and lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Suit waistcoat in woven fabric with lining fabric at the back. Buttons at the front, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Knee socks that shape the calves and enhance circulation in the legs. 40 denier.

Set with dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Dungarees with adjustable straps with concealed press-studs at the front, a chest and back pocket with a button, and side pockets. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Patterned top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Pyjamas in soft, jacquard-weave viscose. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with decorative piping. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with slits at the hems.
Poncho top with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, padded gilet with a high shine. Padded, detachable hood, a chunky two-way zip down the front and a detachable tie belt that can be fastened in various ways. Two internal shoulder straps so you can wear the gilet around your shoulders. Concealed front pockets with a zip, and two inner pockets. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
Sleeveless, A-line dress covered in sequins.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey that can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring wrapover hood, long sleeves with stripes down the sides, and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Lace-trimmed V-neck, detachable ties below the bust and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, 3/4-length, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an elasticated waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short skirt in a soft weave with buttons down the front, a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top and side pockets. Unlined.
Derby shoes in imitation suede with open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and crêpe soles. Heel 2 cm.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.

Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with embroidered details, a detachable, lined hood, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, a fake welt pocket at the top, adjustable elastication at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a frill trim over the shoulders.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton piqué.
Long-sleeved jersey tops made from organic cotton.
Flared vest top in a crêpe weave with beaded embroidery and narrow tie shoulder straps.
Fully lined mittens in soft leather with elasticated cuffs. Lining in a wool and cashmere blend.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a smocked seam under the bust.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), visible zip down the front and a frayed, cut-off hem.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey containing some viscose with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut dress in an airy, textured weave with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a flounce at the front that runs down the sleeves to the cuffs. Partly lined.
Shorter, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and cut-out section over one shoulder.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Flat cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
